document.full_text: a settlement between a coalition of federal and state agencies and banks over foreclosure practices will take longer to hammer out than many expect, bank of america corp chief executive brian moynihan said on wednesday.
document.title: bofa ceo says foreclosure deal will take time
lines_and_colors: a settlement between a coalition of federal and state agencies and banks over foreclosure practices will take longer to hammer out than many expect, bank of america corp chief executive brian moynihan said on wednesday.
